page.title: 01Transport
page.content: The local{bus}company is{Southdown}.A Southdown bus is quite reliable unlike some other bus companys I could mention.The buses start at{Brighton and end up in{Horsham.}The journey takes 1 hour 24 minutes.By that time they have stopped 22 times.The bus from Brighton to Horsham only stops twice outside our school at 8.05 AM and at 9.35 AM.We asked 23 people in our class how many{cars}their family had.Two people had got one car, fifteen had two cars,four people had three, one person had four and one person had six.As you can see most of the people had two cars.I was surprised that not many people had one car.Most people in our class had either one or two{bicycles}one person has four and another has five, I was not surprised.
